data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Kalka, India - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. October and November are months with the least rain in Kalka, India, when the rain falls for 3.3 days and typically aggregates up to 7mm (0.28") of rain. August is the most humid month in Kalka, India, with an average relative humidity of 72%.
data.text:
Average temperature

Kalka, India

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is June (39.4째C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (18.9째C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is June (27.1째C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (7.4째C).

Average snowfall days

Kalka, India

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is September (0.1 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, October, November and December (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Kalka, India

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 14h and 6min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 10h and 12min).

The months with the most sunshine are May and June (Average sunshine: 12h and 6min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 7h and 6min).

Average UV index

Kalka, India

The months with the highest UV index are April, May and June (UV index 8).

The months with the lowest UV index are January and December (UV index 4).

Average visibility

Kalka, India

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, October, November and December (10km).

The months with the lowest visibility are July, August and September (9km).
